name: Proceed to checkout as guest user with incorrect telephone number
scenarioId: classpath:features/guest_checkout:Proceed to checkout as guest user with incorrect telephone number
methodName: Proceed to checkout as guest user with incorrect telephone number

testSteps.description: Given the user is not logged in
And the user is on the home page
When the user selects a product from the product list
And the user navigates to the product details page
And the user adds the product to the cart
And the user navigates to the cart page
When the user proceeds to checkout
And the user chooses guest checkout

testSteps.description: Then user navigate to checkout page
And the checkout page should display the correct product and price details
When the user fills the all the checkout details with incorrect telephone number
Then an error message should be displayed "Invalid mobile number format."

title: Proceed to checkout as guest user with incorrect telephone number
